Text: This version doesn't work, the torrent is solid but this version just plain doesn't work.  I've heard 5.8.8 works good, so I'm gonna give that one a try and report back.

Tried another 5.8.8 torrent, but because of a lack of seeders that went nowhere fast.  Fortunately you can still download the older (working) version of this from the main eraser website, which is hosted off of sourceforge.  Here's a link for those of you who want a WORKING version of eraser:

http://sourceforge.net/projects/eraser/files/Eraser%205/5.8.8/Eraser%205.8.8.exe/download
